commercialsystem.422: Commercials can only be run on partnered channels, once per 8 minutes, when the stream is live, for one of the following lengths: 30, 60, 90, 120, 150, 180
commercialsystem.autotimer.status-off: Commercial autotimer is off. To enable: !commercial autotimer (interval_mins:8 or greater) (length_secs:30,60,90,120,150,180) [message]
commercialsystem.autotimer.status-on: Commercial autotimer is on. $1 seconds of ads every $2 minutes. To disable: !commercial autotimer off --or-- To add/change a message: !commercial autotimer message (message) --or-- To remove message: !commercial autotimer nomessage
commercialsystem.autotimer.bad-parm: Failed to set autotimer. Interval must be at least 8 minutes and length must be one of: 30, 60, 90, 120, 150, 180
commercialsystem.autotimer.status-on-msg: The message sent when an auto commercial starts: $1
commercialsystem.autotimer.status-on-nom: No message is sent when an auto commercial starts
commercialsystem.autotimer.msg-set: Changed the message sent when an auto commercial starts to: $1
commercialsystem.autotimer.msg-del: No longer sending a message when an auto commercial starts
